title: Ticket #117: DAGMan: generate report on time spent when DAG completes.
description:
From condor-support 7727: "How hard would it be for dagman to keep track of runtimes when it parses the condor log file to figure out job status? It would be really nice to have dagman print a summary at the end of dagman.out that contained the total time idle in queue, time running and time spent in a checkpoint for the jobs."

(Imported from 1695 (backup) 1695 (public))
remarks:
2010-Jun-18 11:48:20 by wenger:
We talked about basically appending the output of condor_userlog to the dagman.out file, but this is kind of waiting for more feedback from Duncan.
2010-Oct-20 15:59:08 by jfrey:
Bulk change of target version from v070504 to v070505 using ./ticket-target-mover.

2010-Oct-27 14:10:32 by psilord:
From duncan: 

I think Doug's user log analyzer does what we need, so you can
probably close this ticket.

So, I'm going to close this ticket.
creator: adesmet
